what he comes to and informs him of a fiber or a choice, and he made it easy for him to create him with the creation of the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who created, with a raid and a distance from him, then a distance and a distance from the woven of the homes Explanation and liberation, and only the pleasant is the expert: الم الم الم الن الم الم الم الم الم الم signs, then guided them to his religion and knowing his neutralization with the connotations and signs.It was said: He appreciated their forces and guided them to demand them.On the authority of a fighter and the dog: they were able to remember them and the guidance of the male, how is the female come, and from Mujahid: the human being and the Baham and the guidance of the human being for the good, the evil, the good, the goodness, the goodness, the goodness of the good The boy was estimated in the stomach, nine, less or more, and more, and guided him to the elderly from him to the periphery.It was said: The benefits were estimated in the things and the guidance of the human being for their exit, and the first is what was mentioned first, and perhaps what is in the quarrels of the sayings in terms of delegation, not specialization.And (Al -Farah) was claimed that in the verse, it is sufficient and the original: so guided and misleading and not in something.Al -Kisa’i read:
